title: Astra Link
situation: Global logistics firm facing 15% latency in routing decisions due to legacy centralized systems.
task: Migrate to an edge-computed agentic architecture to decentralize decision-making.
action: Architected a distributed system using Rust and WebAssembly.
Implemented a peer-to-peer coordination protocol for autonomous agents.
Deployed edge nodes across 5 continents using Kubernetes.

title: Quantum UI
situation: Design teams struggling with consistency across 20+ micro-frontends.
task: Create an AI-augmented design system that generates components based on user intent.
action: Built a LLM-powered CLI for component generation.
Developed a 'Design Token' sync engine using Figma API.
Created a React-based interactive documentation portal.
